finalPattern.pattern_name: Front-loaded, high-arousal 'oddly satisfying' mechanical moments paired with a trend-tagged title (#oddlysatisfying) and emoji hook drive swipe-stop, early retention (first 3‚Äì5s), and loop rate in Shorts, resulting in outsized distribution.
